en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:15.sentence: Oh yeah...the view was good, too.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:2.sentence: Ray's is something of a Seattle institution, but given its gorgeous Sound views, I had suspected that the accolades were more due to the scenery than to the food and service.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:4.sentence: To start things off, our lovely server Brooke was quickly on hand to take my drink order.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:5.sentence: My party of two was feeling particularly ambitious, and we splurged on the Shilshole Sampler...a beautiful assortment of enormous white gulf prawns, smoked albacore tuna, Ray's fantastic manila clams seasoned with dill, scallops in a tasty soy dressing, and a tiny pile of Dungeness crab atop a sublime butter sauce.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:6.sentence: For my entrée, I completely enjoyed the seared Alaskan sea scallops complemented by chard, artichoke hearts, fennel, and pecorino toscano.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:7.sentence: The scallops are apparently cooked in a black olive butter which really makes them unique (not to mention tasty).

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:8.sentence: My friend enjoyed the grilled Alaskan King Salmon with delectable creamed Washington russet potatoes and crisp green beans.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775918:9.sentence: I had a taste of all three items on her plate, and they were superb.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775919:1.sentence: – ...and the best summertime deck experience--they will even bring you a blanket if you get cold in the Seattle evening weather.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775919:2.sentence: A perfect place to take out of town guests any time of the year.

en_Ray'sBoathouse_477775920:3.sentence: Great seasonal fish and seafood, with a classy waterfront setting.

en_Sage_480875505:3.sentence: Caution - its real food for people who love the best.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_479991844:2.sentence: The service is fantastic at this fun place.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480032670:5.sentence: The specialty here is decadent pancakes, but I've been back now four times, and I've been wowed every time.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480032670:6.sentence: Nothing on the menu is less than amazing.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480133929:4.sentence: The service was excellent, the coffee was good even by starbucks standards and the food was outstanding.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480171723:13.sentence: In the end our check came to $27 for 4 small pancakes, a breakfast burrito, an orange juice and an iced tea (I had water).

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480171723:3.sentence: The presentation of Snooze is excellent and it is one of those places that you feel more sophisticated just for being there; but peel back the layers and you have an overpriced IHOP with a high brow menu.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480171723:5.sentence: They serve it in a tall, skinny hour-glass shaped glass to disguise the fact that you a getting a small juice at the price of a half gallon in a supermarket.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480171723:6.sentence: I should have just asked for the check when I saw that; but their menu was so unique that I continued.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480171723:7.sentence: The pancakes were certainly inventive but $8.50 for 3 - 6" pancakes (one of them was more like 5") in the pancake flight (sample of 3 different pancakes) is well over-priced.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480171723:8.sentence: The pancakes should be larger (at least 8") to justify the expense even with the unique offerings.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480412257:3.sentence: The waiter was a bit unfriendly and the feel of the restaurant was crowded.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480412257:5.sentence: Most importantly, we were so excited about the food after seeing the very creative menu.

en_SnoozeanAMEatery_480412257:6.sentence: At best, the food was good and definately overpriced.
